flagHandling.name: Custom flags.dnd5e hook
flagHandling.hint: allows you to use class @scale values in auras that set flags.dnd5e.values

autoVision.name: Auto token vision
autoVision.hint: Sets token vision based on current senses when creating a token from an actor

autoEffects.name: Auto Effects
autoEffects.hint: Automatically apply 'self' targeted effects on cast (requires DAE and RSR5E)

piercer.name: Piercer
piercer.hint: Adds an additional dice to crits with piercing damage

toolExpertise.name: Tool Expertise
toolExpertise.hint: Double your proficiency bonus with tools you are proficient with (libWrapper required)
